gametools

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • gametools.Group

  • public class Group
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing and updating groups of sprites.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Group()
      Creates a blank group with no sprites.
      Group(Group copy)
      Creates a copy of the specified group.
      Group(java.util.List<Sprite> elements)
      Creates a group from the passed in sprites.
      Group(Sprite... elements)
      Creates a group from the passed in sprites.

      • isWithin

        public boolean isWithin(double x,
                        double y)
        Checks if the passed in position is within at least one element in the group.
        Parameters:
        x - The x of the point to test collision against.
        y - The y of the point to test collision against.
        Returns:
        True if at least one element is within the point.

        Returns:

      • clear

        public void clear(boolean safe)
        Empties the group of all elements.
        Parameters:
        safe - If true, immediately removes all elements, which can cause errors if list if currently being iterated upon. If false, sets the remove tag to true on all elements causing them to be removed safely in the next iteration.

      • remove

        public void remove(int i)
        Removes the specified sprite from the group.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the sprite to remove.

      • remove

        public void remove(Sprite sprite)
        Removes the specified sprite from the group.
        Parameters:
        sprite - The sprite to remove.

      • remove

        public void remove(Group sprites)
        Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
        Parameters:
        sprites - An group of sprites to remove.

      • remove

        public void remove(Sprite... sprites)
        Removes all the passed in sprites.
        Parameters:
        sprites - The sprites to remove.

      • remove

        public void remove(java.util.List<Sprite> sprites)
        Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
        Parameters:
        sprites - An array list of sprites to remove from the group.

      • removeWhenOutsideBounds

        public void removeWhenOutsideBounds(boolean remove)
        Sets whether or not to remove sprites from the group if they go outside their boundaries.
        Parameters:
        remove - Whether or not to remove sprites from the group.

      • setRemoveArea

        public void setRemoveArea(Area area)
        Defines the area the sprites can move inside. If removing sprites is turned on and a sprite goes outside this area the sprite will automatically be removed.
        Parameters:
        area - The area sprites are allowed to move within.

      • script

        public void script(Script script)
        Adds a custom script to each sprite.
        Parameters:
        script - The script to add to the sprites.

      • removeScript

        public void removeScript()
        Removes the script from each sprite.

      • removeWhenOffScreen

        public void removeWhenOffScreen()
        Removes all sprites automatically as soon as they leave the screen.

      • turn

        public void turn(Sprite.Rotation rot)
        Turns all the sprites in the group in the specified direction.
        Parameters:
        rot - The rotation constant for the direction the sprite should turn in.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(double x,
                   double y,
                   Sprite.Rotation rot)
        Rotates all the sprites in the group around the specified position.
        Parameters:
        x - The x of the point around which to rotate.
        y - The y of the point around which to rotate.
        rot - The direction to rotate in.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(Position mid,
                   Sprite.Rotation rot)
        Rotates all the sprites in the group around the specified position.
        Parameters:
        mid - The position around which to rotate.
        rot - The direction to rotate in.

      • translate

        public void translate(double hor,
                      double ver)
        Translates all the sprites in the group.
        Parameters:
        hor - The amount to shift the group horizontally (positive means to the right).
        ver - The amount to shift the group vertically (positive means to the down).

      • translate

        public void translate(Position trans)
        Translates all the sprites in the group.
        Parameters:
        trans - The amount translate the group by.

      • drawAll

        public void drawAll()
        Runs the draw method on every sprite and removes sprites as necessary.
